references.reason: This paper introduced the Transformer architecture, a foundational model for SemanIR's design and performance.

references.paper_title: SwinIR: Image restoration using Swin transformer
references.reason: This paper introduced SwinIR, a state-of-the-art image restoration model that SemanIR builds upon and improves.
This book provides a comprehensive theoretical background on machine learning, fundamental to understanding SemanIR's approach.

references.paper_title: Structure-aware transformer for graph representation learning
references.reason: This paper explores graph neural networks and transformers, whose concepts are relevant to SemanIR's design.

references.paper_title: Efficient and explicit modelling of image hierarchies for image restoration
references.reason: This paper, by one of the SemanIR authors, presents relevant prior work on efficient image restoration techniques, establishing a context for SemanIR's innovations.
